comment.author: 78412940@N08
comment._content:
Navajo rug on the floor - identified by the typical corner tassels where the yarns are tied off.

Maybe Rasch acquired it on her trips to Los Angeles - the trains stopped in Santa Fe.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: lazygardens:  Thanks for your identification of the Navajo rug.  We will add it to the image description.
